body_content.explanation: a view of a wide area:
examples: From the hotel roof you can enjoy a panorama of the whole city.
A tunnel of tropical vegetation opens up into a panorama of mountains.

body_content.explanation: a photograph in which the image is shown in a wide view:
examples: A panorama of the planet Mars was named top science photo.
The software will stitch together 800 separate pictures into one huge 360-degree panorama.

body_content.explanation: a view, description, or study of events or activities:
examples: The investigation revealed a panorama of corruption and illegal dealings.
"Saving Savannah" offers a dramatic panorama of everyday life in Savannah.
